strapiPost.title: Underwoods Is Here To Help You Get A Ring By Spring
strapiPost.content:
If engagement is on the horizon, but you don’t know the first thing about buying a ring, the team at Underwood Fine Jewelers can guide you through the process, from planning a ring budget to making your proposal. 

  • Where to start: Underwoods’ guide on How To Buy An Engagement Ring walks you through the process of purchasing a ring so you’ll feel more confident walking into the store. It covers the 4 C’s of diamonds, their different shapes, what metal to choose, and even tips to discover your fiancé's style. 
  • Getting measured: Once you’ve covered all of that, you still have to figure out the ring size! If you’re trying to keep things a secret, here are some clever ideas on How To Get Her Ring Size. 

Underwoods has been a part of couples’ engagement stories since 1957. Start your engagement story with them HERE. (Or be super bold and forward this email to your boyfriend 😬💍👰🏻‍♀️)
